mapper.insert: insert into `DataBase`(company_no, name, description, database_type, create_date, update_date) VALUES (null, #{name}, #{description}, #{database_type}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select EXISTS(select * from `DataBase` WHERE company_no = #{company_no} AND name = #{name})

select NOT EXISTS(select * from `DataBase` left join `table` t on `DataBase`.no = t.database_no left join `column` c on t.id = c.table_id WHERE no = #{database_no} AND (t.id = #{token} OR c.id = #{token}))
